intro: Lotononis mirabilis, commonly known as the marvel lotononis, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking, tubular flowers that range in color from purple to blue. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun conditions. It produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds. Due to its ornamental value and unique appearance, it is often cultivated in gardens and botanical collections.
